description: Trinkets, Curios, Baubles... aren't they all the same?

In your /b/inventory/b/, press the button on the /6/bottom left of the player preview/6/ to open the /b/Curios /b/menu. This lets you equip /b/Rings/b/, /b/Charms/b/, /b/Gloves/b/, and other /b/acessories/b/.
The general /b/Curio/b/ slot /6/accepts any acessory/6/ in it. Additonaly, it /6/keeps with you after death/6/.
